## [Constants](https://www.boost.org/doc/libs/latest/libs/math/doc/html/math_toolkit/constants.html)

### Retrieve Specific Constants

```{r}
constants("pi")
constants("e")
constants("phi")
```

### List All Available Constants

```{r}
constants()
```
